Iâ€™m a Web Developer based in London.

I have a solid background in the creative industries but a few years ago, I flirted with coding and I knew I would someday return to it.

So, after many years of enjoying a profesional career in the film and photography fields, I thought it was the perfect moment to kickstart my life in the technology industry.

I am a very curious person, which took me to live and work in places such as Japan and Morocco. This curiosity also meant I always wanted to know everything related to coding.

I am passionate about having an innovative approach to self-expression through my work and I want to develop a fresh and dynamic path between the code and the final product.
